extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Dickinson Mobile!From daily menus to Compass announcements, from sports updates to thelatest news and events, Dickinson Mobile offers information tools theentire campus community can useâall at your fingertips.Features:â¢ College Directories: Search for students, faculty or staff or getinformation on academic or administrative departments. A tap of thefinger lets you call or e-mail.â¢ Campus Locations: Search for buildings or places on campus usingthis interactive map and GPS.â¢ Emergency Contacts: Get instant access to the Department of PublicSafety and other emergency phone numbers.â¢ Calendar of Events: Find out whatâs happening on campus. Search bydate or event type.â¢ News: Read the latest campus news stories and see recentannouncements from The Compass.â¢ Dining Menus: Check out the daily specials and find out which diningvenue is serving whatâfrom the Dining Hall to Union Station.â¢ Athletics: Get Red Devil news, scores and schedules.â¢ Social Media: Join the conversation and check out Dickinson onFacebook, Twitter and YouTube.

reviews.title: did anybody test this first?
reviews.comment: campus maps = dead links, no dickinson news at all.   just go to the web page instead.
